POLICY.POLICY_DATA: policy Description: ''; CharSet: EBCDIC; PageBreaks: CC; LineBreaks: 132; CRValue: 13; LFValue: 37; SampleFile: '.\RPT\Ac001e.rpt'; field Report_ID: level(1), string, rowcol(2, 17); Dept: level(1), string, rowcol(3, 17);Region: level(1), string, rowcol(4, 17); Office: level(1), string, rowcol(5, 17); index REPORT_ID: Report_ID; SECTION_ID: Dept, Region, Office;

REPORT.DESCRIPTION: Note that %REPORTID% gets truncated to 8 characters. Use %REPORTID.10% to get the entire report ID. Also, in general, avoid using relative paths.

TOPIC.TOPIC_NAME: Total amount for a financial operation

MEMBER_TOPIC.TOPIC_NAME: Second Account Holder (Only if it is a joint account)
Main number to contact the Person
Year of manufacturing of the Insured Car
Type of the Certificate - Birth or Death
Place of the event (Birth or Death)
Person to whom the check is written
Date of appointment with the doctor
Type of Exam requested (XRay or MRI)
Part of the body where the exam was taken
Total Amount Paid in this Payroll

MEMBER_TOPIC.DESCRIPTION: Date timestamp of when the event was issued
Report ID. Implied format is CHAR(10)
Report Version. Implied format is YYYYMMDDHHMMSS
Visible portion of section id. Implied format is VARCHAR(30)
Original page number of document start in the base version. Implied format is NUMBER(10,0)
User ID that performed check-out. Implied format is VARCHAR(128)
User ID that performed check-in. Implied format is VARCHAR(128)
The check-out timestamp represented as number of epoch milliseconds in Zulu time. Implied format is NUMBER(19,0)
The check-in timestamp represented as number of epoch milliseconds in Zulu time. Implied format is NUMBER(19,0)
User message. Implied format is VARCHAR(255)
Sequence number of this version. Base version is number 1. Implied format is NUMBER(10,0)
Version Tag. Implied format is VARCHAR(255)
Key identifying the check-out. Implied format is CHAR(36)
Page count of this version. Implied format is NUMBER(10,0)
